snippet: The release of a new Google Maps app for the iPhone may help Apple customers find their way, but it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to improve its own service.
abstract: Release of new Google Maps app for iPhone may help Apple customers find their way, but it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to improve its own maps service.
lead_paragraph: The release of a new Google Maps app for the iPhone may help Apple customers find their way, but it will not relieve Apple of the pressure to improve its own service.

headline.seo: Google Releases Maps App for iPhone as Apple Regroups
headline.main: While Apple Regroups, Google Offers a Maps App
headline.print_headline: While Apple Regroups, Google Offers A Maps App
